availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Jonathan "Swift" Darneal (Woodford County, KY, circuit court clerk)

body.p: Woodford County, Kentucky, court clerk. Woodford County, Kentucky, native. Son of Jacob Darneal and Patsy Darneal. Married to Catherine C. "Kate" Hunter Darneal in Woodford County, Kentucky, on January 8, 1856. Attorney in Woodford County in 1850. Clerk of the Woodford Circuit Court in Woodford County in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Woodford County in 1860. Clerk of the Woodford Circuit Court in Woodford County in 1863. Clerk of the Woodford Circuit Court in Woodford County in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Woodford County, District 1, p. 427B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Woodford County, p. 927.

Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Woodford County, Versailles, p. 527B.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994058, Woodford County Marriages.
